input.sentences: the family included him all the time .
dad taught [male] to throw a ball for fido to fetch .
fido did n't quite know what to do when they got out the pinata .
when [male] took a swing at it | fido barked and ran in circles .
output.sentences: Come on, Rex, we're going to go play.
Mom and Dad want us to entertain you.
Hey, little man,  you  want a potato?
No, I think I'd rather play over there.
